x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: If the glide.activity.api_version property has been modified previously, it will not be updated during upgrade. This script ensures that each instance is using activity stream version 1 after upgrade.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Ensure Activity Stream V1 Enabled

sys_update_version.name: x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts_36937b4483e89e50c6695855eeaad371
sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts"><x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description>If the glide.activity.api_version property has been modified previously, it will not be updated during upgrade.
